title: Tides of Vengeance
subtitle: The Serpent's Awakening
description: Rise from the depths as the ancient Naga civilization reclaims its rightful dominion over the coastal realms. Command the serpentine legions in a war of conquest and retribution against those who desecrated the sacred waters.
shortDescription: Lead the Naga empire from the depths to reclaim the surface world.

story.synopsis: The surface dwellers have polluted the sacred waters and disturbed the Naga's eternal slumber. Empress Ssylthara awakens her people to wage war upon the land-walkers and restore the ancient empire.
story.prologue: For ten thousand years, the Naga slumbered in the abyssal depths, dreaming of the empire that once spanned both sea and shore. But the surface dwellers grew bold. They dumped their filth into the sacred waters. They dredged the seabeds for treasure. They awoke something ancient, something hungry for vengeance.
story.epilogue: The tides have turned. The coastal kingdoms bow before the Naga throne, and the sacred waters run clean once more. Yet Empress Ssylthara knows that maintaining an empire above the waves will require more than military might. A new age of Naga civilization begins.
story.setting: The Coastal Realms and the Abyssal Kingdom
